alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:34PM MST until March 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
